oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bicentennial Capitol Mall State Park World War II Memorial
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color photograph of the globe from the World War II Memorial at Bicentennial Capitol Mall State Park in Nashville, Tennessee. A round graphic in the bottom right corner promotes Tennessee's bicentennial celebration. Features a divided back and narrative on reverse. [No. B21524]
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: State parks & reserves; Monuments & memorials
